SUPERMAN: SON OF KAL-EL #1
Jonathan Kent has experienced a lot in his young life. He's traveled the galaxies with his Kryptonian grandfather and lived in the future with the Legion of Super-Heroes, who were intent on training him for the day his father, Clark Kent, could no longer be Superman. There is a hole in the Legion's history that prevents Jon from knowing exactly when that will happen, but all signs point to it being very soon. It's time for the son to wear the cape of his father and bear the symbol of hope that has told the world who Superman really is. Join writer Tom Taylor (Nightwing, DCeased) and artist John Timms (Infinite Frontier) as they usher in a whole new era for the House of El! Also, “Tales of Metropolis” continues. Jimmy Olsen gathers his misfit heroes, including Ambush Bug and Gangbuster, to find out who the Projectress really is and why she set her sights on Bibbo!
FIND A COMIC SHOP NEAR YOU

Termini e condizioni
{"desktop_buybox_group_1":} Opzioni di acquisto e componenti aggiuntivi
A new Man of Steel for a new era! Jonathan Kent dons his father’s cape as the 21st century Superman, from the bestselling writer of DCeased and Injustice!Jonathan Kent has experienced a lot in his young life. He’s fought evil with Robin, traveled across galaxies with his Kryptonian grandfather, and lived in the future with the Legion of Super-Heroes, who were intent on training him for the day his father could no longer be Superman. There is a hole in the Legion’s history that prevents Jon from knowing exactly when that will happen, but all signs point to it being very soon. It’s time for the son to wear his father's cape and continue the never-ending battle as a symbol of hope for his home planet. But can Jon be Superman and still have a normal life? The son of Clark Kent and Lois Lane will learn the hard way as he heads to college and combats the dangers of the modern world. Superstar writer Tom Taylor (DCeased, Injustice) teams with visionary artist John Timms (Future State: Superman of Metropolis) to tell the saga of the 21st century Superman! This volume collects Superman: Son of Kal-El #1-6. Leggi di più

Dalethe baker5,0 su 5 stelle
I love ir!
Recensito negli Stati Uniti il 24 luglio 2023Acquisto verificato
I grew up reading comic books in the late 50's through mid 70's. After college, I didn't exactly lose interest, but day job and theatre projects took up much of my time, (not to mention caring for my parents) and I mostly lost track of storylines, etc. And they seem to change a lot over the years. I was aware of THIS storyline from web articles, but there are no comic stores really near me. I recently got a Hollywood Spotlight mag at the grocery store, which focuses on the history of comics, and it peaked my interest, especially in "Superboy and Legion" stories, and wanted to see where this was going. Mostly love it, though it helped that the mag filled in a few blanks. I am amending my review to 5 stars - either I misread the Amazon page or it was amended. I have now ordered the next two volumes!

not customer5,0 su 5 stelle
ふたつめに知ったDC作品となった。
Recensito in Giappone il 6 giugno 2022Acquisto verificato
本書電子版22ページめ、森林火災現場での救助の場面が好きだ。主人公がどのような種類の優しさを持った人物なのか、視覚的に感じられる。救助活動のはじめに "HI. I'M JON." と声をかけ、名前をたずねる姿勢が好きだ。主人公は友人として、力になりたいと思っている。主人公は耳も目も何もかもが、とびぬけてよい。自分の力がつよいことを知っているので、他者に対しての自己主張は控えめだ。社会との関わりかたを模索しながら、友人を増やし世界を広げてゆく。主人公の生活に救助活動以外でも楽しみがふえることを、勝手に夢見ながら読んでいる。ジャンル外からきた読者候補の検討の参考に、・sonとsunがあやふやな英語理解度でも、翻訳appを使ったらどうにか読めた。・本書は、ほぼ毎月一話ずつ発刊されている漫画作品の1〜6話をまとめたものに、すこしおまけがついている。・フラッシュバックのトリガーとなりうる困難描写が散見される。肉体的な暴力の絵画表現は、DC他作品と比べて控えめ。・DC作品の知識がなくても大丈夫だった。Supermanさんが地球人ではないことや救助活動の仲間がいることなど、読んでいたらなんとなくわかった。ひっかかったことだけ検索するとよい。ひとつだけ困ったのは、4話の素敵なひとが何者であるか。Hippolytaさんです。・目的にすべきは出来事や人物の把握ではなく、好みの作品系列をみつけることだ。膨大な作品群は複雑に繋がっていて、毎週いくつも新刊が追加される。推し関連全回収はかなり厳しい。嗅覚を頼りに大雑把に読むとよい。・1巻の荷が重いなら、7〜8話を短編作品のつもりで読んでみると、物語の質感がわかる。水難の場面が続くため気をつけて。見どころはThe Truth啓蒙動画のナレーションだ。おとぎ話のようだと感じたが、実際はどんな声で語りかけているのだろう。視聴し放題になりたい。7話
https://www.amazon.co.jp/Superman-Son-Kal-El-2021-English-ebook/dp/B09NS3QW8Z
8話

Segnala
Traduci recensione in Italiano
Leaboy5,0 su 5 stelle
Super!
Recensito nel Regno Unito il 19 luglio 2022Acquisto verificato
I am beyond happy with this book. The writing and art are excellent and the Travis Moore covers are worth the price on their own. The handling of Jon’s coming out is sensitive and very sweet. This is the book you need to put into the hands of any youngster you think may have questions about their place in the world.But it is still a well written superhero adventure so it is a great read for almost anyone.Thanks Tom Taylor and everyone else connected with this high quality title. I can’t recommend it enough.
Leggi di più
